alert.note: Alert for Eastern Kiowa County; Western Kiowa County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Warning issued October 16 at 3:46AM MDT until October 17 at 9:00AM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 9 AM MDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 29 expected. * WHERE...Kiowa county. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 9 AM MDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Kiowa County; Western Kiowa County
